title: Pokémon the Movie 2000
description: Ash and Pikachu must restore balance when a collector attempts to awaken the Legendary Pokémon Lugia as Pokémon the Movie 2000 comes to Pokémon TV.

media.title: Pokémon the Movie 2000
media.description: The balance of the environment is disrupted when a Pokémon collector captures Articuno, Zapdos, and Moltres in an attempt to awaken Lugia. Ash and Pikachu must battle to stop this wicked scheme and rescue the Legendary Pokémon.
